name: QiblaFinder
description: Find the Kabba/Qibla while playing Geometry Dash!

privacyPolicy.name: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.desc:
QiblaFinder stores your latitude and longitude coordinates in its own mod settings. Other Geode mods may be able to access this information as they please.
<cy>To minimize the likelihood of other mods misusing this information, please use</c> <cl>https://latlong.net/countries</c> <cy>and find the location closest to you to set your coordinates.</c>

The AlAdhan API does not remember your latitude and longitude coordinates. While the AlAdhan API is aware of your latitude/longitude coordinates when performing the calculations, none of this information is stored for future use.
<cy>You are able to disable access to the AlAdhan API in the mod's settings.</c>
<cy>If API access is unavailable or if you disable API access in the mod settings, QiblaFinder performs local calculations instead.</c>

<cp>By installing/continuing to use QiblaFinder, you agree to these terms. To opt-out, simply disable or uninstall the QiblaFinder mod.</c>

latLongDotNet.name: Click me to find your nearest latitude/longitude coordinates!
latLongDotNet.desc:
This link is important for those who don't want to give their exact coordinates.

<cy>By clicking</c> <cl>"Open latlong.net"</c><cy>, you agree that any coordinates you use from</c> <cl>latlong.net</c> <cy>represent the coordinates of the city closest to you, and agree to hold yourself</c> <cl>(and only yourself)</c> <cy>responsible for any inaccurate calculations performed by either</c> <cl>QiblaFinder</c> <cy>or the</c> <cl>AlAdhan API</c><cy>.</c>

useAPI.name: Use AlAdhan API
useAPI.description:
Use the AlAdhan API for finding the Kabba/Qibla, instead of local calculations.

<cy>If this is enabled and there is no Internet available/the API is down, the mod will fall back to local calculations.</c>

userLatitude.name: Your Latitude
userLatitude.description:
Insert your latitude coordinates here.

<cy>A latitude of 0.00 represents the Equator, which crosses through Indonesia, Kiribati, Kenya, Colombia, and Ecuador.</c>

userLongitude.name: Your Longitude
userLongitude.description:
Insert your longitude coordinates here.

<cy>A longitude of 0.00 represents the Prime Meridian, which crosses through France, Spain, Algeria, Togo, and Ghana.</c>

issues.info: To disable hyphen prefixes and suffixes in custom messages, edit saved.json. For other issues, ping me <cl>(@erymanthus)</c> in the Geode SDK Discord server's <cl>#help</c> channel if you need help. <cr>DMs are NOT accepted.</c>
